item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, April 22, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Offical XRP NPM package has been compromised and key stealing malware introduced (28 points | 6 comments)
2. Coding as Craft: Going Back to the Old Gym (50 points | 38 comments)
3. Should We Respect LLMs? A Study on Influence of Prompt Politeness on Performance (21 points | 16 comments)
4. Attacking My Landlord's Boiler (202 points | 102 comments)

6. Does RL Incentivize Reasoning in LLMs Beyond the Base Model? (12 points | 3 comments)

8. FreeDOS 1.4 Is Here (76 points | 13 comments)
9. GiveCampus (YC S15) Is Hiring Sr engineers passionate about education ( | hide)
10. Can rotation solve the Hubble Puzzle? (26 points | 17 comments)
11. A Real-Time Algorithm for Non-Convex Powered Descent Guidance [pdf] (6 points | discuss)

19. We Diagnosed and Fixed the 2023 Voyager 1 Anomaly from 15B Miles Away [video] (62 points | 6 comments)
20. Fujitsu and RIKEN develop world-leading 256-qubit sup quantum computer (49 points | 10 comments)
21. SerenityOS is a love letter to '90s user interfaces (12 points | 3 comments)
22. 101 BASIC Computer Games (125 points | 72 comments)
23. Student loans in default to be referred to debt collection, Dept of Ed says (10 points | 2 comments)
24. Launch HN: Magic Patterns (YC W23) – AI Design and Prototyping for Product Teams (165 points | 95 comments)
25. Cheating the Reaper in Go (149 points | 20 comments)
26. Astronomers confirm the existence of a lone black hole (206 points | 133 comments)
27. AI for Network Engineers: Understanding Flow, Flowlet, and Packet-Based LB (21 points | 2 comments)
28. A new form of verification on Bluesky (352 points | 240 comments)
29. LLM-powered tools amplify developer capabilities rather than replacing them (305 points | 201 comments)
30. Pipelining might be my favorite programming language feature (343 points | 300 comments)
